disclaimer.understand_risks: Operating a Vault doesn't come without risks. Before making a deposit, it is best to research and understand the risks involved.
disclaimer.running_vault_requirments: Operating a Vault client involves running a fully automated client on a server. This client has access to hot wallets for both Bitcoin and the Interlay/Kintsugi networks.
disclaimer.understand_liquidation_risks: Depositing collateral means accepting the risk of being liquidated if your collateralization rates drops, as well as the protocol risks of each collateral asset.
disclaimer.check_do_s_and_dont_s: Check the <1>do's and dont's</1> of correctly operating your vault client
disclaimer.check_risks_involved: Please check the information about <1>risks involved</1> when operating a Vault on Interlay/Kintsugi
